content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between an applicant and a defendant the applicant was awarded an apartment a car and personal property while the defendant was awarded a different apartment a car and personal property the court also ordered the applicant to pay the defendant compensation various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property were discussed in the case the applicant filed a claim seeking the dissolution of their marriage and a declaration of divorce with legal effects on the spouses property rights the breakdown of the marriage was blamed on the applicants conduct the court decided to support the counterclaim made by one of the parties and dissolved the marriage due to the fault of both spouses the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant compensation and costs both parties were required to pay stamp duties to the state

metadata.cost: 25.54 EUR (legal fees) + 524.00 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the defendant + 162.00 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
